GREEN-DB and GREEN-VARAN

  • The GREEN-DB
  • GREEN-VARAN tool set
  • Download resources
GREEN-DB and GREEN-VARAN
  • »
  • Download resources
  • View page source

Download resourcesÂ¶

To perform annotations GREEN-VARAN tools require a series of supporting files. By default, various resources are expected in the resources folder within the tool folder. The expected folder structure in resources is as follow

.
|-- SQlite
|   `-- RegulatoryRegions.db
|-- SV_annotations
|   `-- BED files used for SV annotations
|-- bed_files
|   `-- GREEN-DB BED files
|-- scores
|   `-- scores annotations
`-- AF
    `-- population AF annotations

When you clone the GREEN-VARAN repository a prepare_resources.sh script is provided in resources folder to automatically download supporting files and setup the resources folder.

Otherwise, single files are available for download from Zenodo repository
